_header: Saint Luke us tells if we take tent
_description: Gospel for Saturday after the Second Sunday in Lent in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint luke vs telles if we tak tentAls crist with his desciples went…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And to forgif vs all oure mysAnd bring vs vnto endles blis
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Homo quidam habuit duos filios.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.53-59.
